name: MM
storyline:
'Did I live a life without regrets?'

A man who made the imperfect time-machine request you to conclude his life
It's unable to rewind the time, but able to rewrite the speed of the memory
A happy and pleasant memory passes so fast.
An hour feels like a minute.
But, a boring and sad memory feels like endless
A minute turns into an hour

Which memory is precious?
By inserting the memory into the time module, you can conclude his life
Is it possible to live a life without regrets?
It's up to you
summary: A narrative game about "a man's request for a life without regrets".
